name: gold antivirus - free edition
short_description:
Free antivirus software is the state of art free security software. Its 100% Free to download and use.
Gold Antivirus wants to create a unified approach to your computer security. Gold Antivirus: Free Edition is accessible and robust, with an impressive list of free features and stellar performance.
Gold Antivirus has improved installation processes, so it's faster than many other competitors. 
Interface
Windows 8 has forced every Windows software maker around to reconsider how its programs look, and that's a good thing. Whether kicking and screaming or gleefully leaping, software designers are creating new programs and Gold Antivirus is no different. 
The main interface lays out Gold Antivirus: Free Edition's features in a clean, legible manner. The upper right corner has links to Reports, Support, and Options. At first glance, the Options list is quite long, but navigating is impressively accurate.
summary: free antivirus , download and install - 100% free to use
